mean_cn: adj. 久坐不动的，静止的，坐惯的，定栖的
mean_en: staying or living in one place instead of moving to different places
word_etyma: sed坐 + ent…的 + ary形容词后缀 → sedentary 坐着的
short_phrase: a sedentary life in an office
sentence: He leads a very sedentary life. I don't think I've ever seen him standing up!
sentence_trans: 他一直就在那里坐着，我想我从没见他站起来过！
